questions.question: Considering the prominent text's layout and overall presentation, what is the primary function of this item?
Based on the extensive list of ingredients, what is the overall nature of the product this label describes?
Considering the detailed breakdown of the confectionery components, what is the overarching type of the product?
Focusing on the explicit declaration of potential allergens, what is a key ingredient present in this product?
Given the extensive list of ingredients and additives, what is another key allergen present?
Observing the distinct sections within the text, what is a specific ingredient indicated as being present in less than 1%?
Examining the numerous color additives mentioned, what is one such coloring agent listed?
Noticing the variety of nuts specified, what is another type of nut besides peanuts explicitly mentioned?
Considering the list of ingredients used in the main candy component, what is the primary sweetener used?
Focusing on the components used to give texture, what is a specific type of wax listed?
Considering the numerous ingredients, what type of oil is used?
Observing the detailed ingredient list, what type of fruit is added to the mix?
Based on the ingredients indicated, what is another type of nut contained in the product?
Considering the listed additives, what is a type of gum used in the product?
Looking at the allergen warning section, what is another allergen present besides peanuts and milk?
